name: upholsterer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person whose job is to make and fit soft coverings for furniture: Novice upholsterers have to work for minimum wage, and buy their own hand tools. Not even a good upholsterer can perform miracles on cheap furniture. See
upholster
More examplesFewer examplesMaster upholsterers are rarely able to find people willing to take it up as career.Get a sofa cover made by the best upholsterer you can afford.He left his tough secondary school at 16 and became a car upholsterer.
